post:
First I'd Thanks everyone here.

We utilize the power of OpenVZ and KVM Virtualisation Technology for complete control. We owned our Hardware and Colo in USA, Dallas and Middle East, Egypt as well. We are using SuperMicro Quad Core Xeon E3 or Jaketown E5 Hex-Core processors with 32GB or 64GB ECC DDR3 memory along with Raid 10 Cheetah 15.7 SAS 6Gb/s or Fast Enterprise Harddrive. All servers 24/7/365 Monitored via secure Monitoring system and our Staff.

What is come with VPS?:
- VPS Supported TUN/TAP, PPTP, Fuse and Systime. 
- vPanel is VPS control panel It allows you to start/stop your VPS. Monitor your VPS resource utilization, view disk space, backup/restore your VPS, and reinstall as well. 
- VPS come with root access. 
- VPS come with 1 Dedicated IPV4. 
- VPS come with 100 Mbps Port Speed. 
- Servers location Dallas, Texas, US. 
- Hardware We are using E5 Jaketown E5 Hex-Core processors or Quad Core E3 with 32 GB or 64 GB Ecc memory along with Raid 10 Cheetah 15.7 SAS 6Gb/s or Fast Enterprise Harddrive. 
- Unmanaged services We are support network troubleshooting.Installing Software is client Responsibility.

More information about vPanel
http://letbox.com/vPanel.php

Custom Plans is available please contact us.
